record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 12
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 12 -- (Senate - March 03, 2008)

[Page: S1437]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, it is my understanding that there is a bill at the desk due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for the second time.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 12) to promote home ownership, manufacturing, and economic growth.

speaking.paragraph: I would object to any further proceedings with respect to this legislation at this time.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
